page.title: 16YOUTH AND COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The Centre provides a base for many groups to meet. Among the most popular are the Youth Clubs, catering for 8 year olds and up: Saturday morning creche and evening discotheques run by the Centre. The Centre is run under a Youth and Community Officer. The location on the Camping Land, on the site of the old Hamond's School, has provided some problems with noise levels, particularly form motor cycles, but this has now largely been resolved. The Centre has now been extended to provide extra space.
